name: Straying Alive
description:
Made in 72 hours for LD46 (: 

Your goal is to protect your base from enemy cells. Once an enemy cell touches the base, it's game over.

  • Control the green cells by dragging
  • Collect food left by enemies to spawn more cells (and earn points!)
  • Protect your base from enemies
  • You can neutralise enemies by merging them with a friendly cell

Can be played on touch screens (tested on iPad), which gives a bit of a twist to the gameplay and allows for couch co-op. This is pretty unbalanced (the game is designed/intended to control by mouse), but fun to try!
